The claim made by Mark Pryor: s ad is that Tom Cotton "voted to turn Medicare into a voucher system."
Cotton: s office did not respond to requests for comment regarding the claim.
Pryor: s spokesman confirmed that the claim was referencing Rep. Paul Ryan's budget proposal, which Cotton voted in favor of.
There is a debate among policy experts a: s proposed plan qualifies as a "voucher system" or "premium support."
